summary: Completed comprehensive testing of video transcription and clipping application. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working with minor video player issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Runtime error: 'The element has no supported sources' when trying to play video
Webpack dev server overlay intercepting pointer events, blocking video controls

passed_tests: Home page loads with upload zone
Upload zone interaction and file validation
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix video player streaming issue - check video format compatibility and streaming endpoint configuration. The 'no supported sources' error suggests video format or MIME type issues.
